TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CopticCalendar extends Android.Icu.Util.CECalendar

Docs.summary: Implement the Coptic calendar system.

remarks.para: Implement the Coptic calendar system.
CopticCalendar usually should be instantiated using android.icu.util.Calendar#getInstance(ULocale) passing in a ULocale with the tag "@calendar=coptic".
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: The value used to set the calendar's #YEAR YEAR time field.
The value used to set the calendar's #MONTH MONTH time field. The value is 0-based. e.g., 0 for Tout.
